text: “Mwa Ayuda alipo omwe amasintha mawu kuwachotsa m’malo mwake. Ndipo amanena (chabe ndi milomo yawo): “Tamva;” (pomwe mitima yawo ikunena): “Tanyoza.” (Ndipo akunena kuuza Mtumiki): “Imva koma wosamveredwa (ndipo pakati pakuyankhula kwawo amanena mawu akuti) ‘Raaina’ (ncholinga chomnenera kuti iye ndimbutuma), mokhotetsa malilime awo (mu zoyankhula zawo kuti akhale ngati akumunenera zabwino pomwe akumtembelera) ndi cholinga chotukwana chipembedzo (cha Chisilamu). Akadakhala kuti iwo adanena: “Tamva ndipo tamvera; ndipo imva, utiyang’anire,” (mmalo mwa kunena kwawo kwakuti: ‘Raaina’), zikadakhala zabwino ndizolingana kwa iwo. Koma Allah adawatembelera chifukwa cha kusakhulupirira kwawo. Sakhulupirira koma pang’ono basi
